question: Who inagurated the exhibition "Traditional Head Gear of India" in New Delhi?
explanation: Smt. Rashmi Verma, Secretary, Ministry of Culture & Tourism inaugurated an exhibition entitled "Traditional Head Gear of India" organised by the National Museum in National Museum Complex, Janpath, New Delhi. It is arranged to showcase printed turban, embroidered dopalli and Maratha stitched cap and zardozi cap.
